com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.animation

Class SpriteAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.Component
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.animation.SpriteAnimator

  • public class SpriteAnimator
extends Component
    A SpriteAnimator uses one or more SpriteAnimations to animate a GameObject having a SpriteRenderer attached.

    It uses a ManagedStateMachine internally to determine the previous animation played, the current animation and the next animation to be played. Every SpriteAnimation represents a single state. States (animations) cannot be changed directly. To change state (animation), the animator relies on Transitions.

    See Also:
    ManagedStateMachine, SpriteAnimation, Transition

      • attach

        public void attach()
        Description copied from class: Component
        Called when this component is attached to a GameObject. Note: At this point it is guaranteed that a game object exists for this component but it is not guaranteed that the game object has been added to a Scene yet!
        Overrides:
        attach in class Component

      • detach

        public void detach()
        Description copied from class: Component
        Called when this component is about to be detached from the host game object. The GameObject instance will become null after this method completes so this is the last place to communicate with the game object. It is usually a good idea to dispose component related resources here. Resources disposed here are usually the ones allocated in Component.attach()
        Overrides:
        detach in class Component

      • addTransition

        public SpriteAnimator addTransition(Transition<SpriteAnimation> transition)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a transition. Note: this will fail if the Transition is for animation(s) that are not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator
        Parameters:
        transition - the transition to add
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Transition is for animation(s) that are not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator

      • addTransition

        public SpriteAnimator addTransition(SpriteAnimation from,
                                    SpriteAnimation to,
                                    ICondition condition,
                                    ICondition... conditions)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a transition given an animation to transition from, an animation to transition to and one or more conditions for the transition. Note: this will fail if either of the animations given is not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator
        Parameters:
        from - the animation to transition from. Can be null. If it is null, transition will be from any state.
        to - the animation to transition to
        condition - a condition for the transition
        conditions - more conditions for the transition
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either of the animations given is not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator

      • addTransition

        public SpriteAnimator addTransition(SpriteAnimation to,
                                    ICondition condition,
                                    ICondition... conditions)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a transition given an animation to transition to from any animation state. Note: this will fail if the animation given is not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator
        Parameters:
        to - the animation to transition to
        condition - a condition for the transition
        conditions - more conditions for the transition
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the animation given is not yet added to the list of animations managed by this animator
